TestCases.Title: Access Login Page from Main Screen
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the main screen of the application.
TestCases.Steps: 1. Click on the 'Login' button or link on the main screen.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: The login page is displayed, allowing the user to enter credentials.

TestCases.Title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
TestCases.Precondition: User is a registered user and on the login page.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Enter a valid email/username.
2. Enter the correct password.
3. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: User is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard/home page.

TestCases.Title: Unsuccessful Login with Invalid Credentials
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the login page.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Enter an invalid email/username or incorrect password.
2. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: The system displays a clear error message indicating wrong credentials and does not proceed to the next page.

TestCases.Title: Required Field Validation for Empty Fields
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the login page.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Leave the email/username and/or password field empty.
2. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: Appropriate field validation messages are displayed indicating that the fields are required.

TestCases.Title: Password Field Masking
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the login page.
TestCases.Steps: 1. Enter any characters in the password field.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: The entered characters in the password field are masked (hidden) from view.

TestCases.Title: Secure Authentication via HTTPS
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the login page with a secure (HTTPS) connection established.
TestCases.Steps: 1. Observe the URL protocol in the browser after navigating to the login page.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: The URL begins with 'https://', ensuring a secure connection for data transmission.

TestCases.Title: Visibility and Functionality of 'Forgot Password' Link
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the login page.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Locate the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.
2. Click on the 'Forgot Password' link.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: The system navigates to the password recovery page where the user can initiate password reset.

TestCases.Title: Functionality of 'Remember Me' Option
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the login page.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Check the 'Remember Me' checkbox.
2. Enter valid credentials.
3. Click on the 'Login' button.
4. Close and re-open the browser.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: User remains logged in or their credentials are remembered for subsequent logins.

TestCases.Title: Account Lockout after Repeated Failed Login Attempts
TestCases.Precondition: User is on the login page and the account policy for failed attempts is implemented.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Enter invalid credentials repeatedly (exceeding the allowed number of attempts).
2. Attempt to login again with any credentials.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: Account is temporarily locked, and an appropriate error message is displayed indicating account lockout.
